column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ A Chinese man visiting his family working in Cambodia collapsed at 8.40 on the morning of June 04
column13: the man woke up and was feeling dizzy. He washed his face and collapsed. He was taken to the hospital
column15: ------Authorities said he had high blood pressure
column16: which caused a stroke. His body was taken to Russian Hospital waiting for approval from the embassy to send back to China.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/447520
